87167.text: The audit event sourceIPs list will now always end with the IP that sent the request directly to the API server.

87167.author: tallclair

93722.text: Fixes a bug evicting pods after a taint with a limited tolerationSeconds toleration is removed from a node

93790.text: Fixes an issue that can result in namespaced custom resources being orphaned when their namespace is deleted, if the CRD defining the custom resource is removed concurrently with namespaces being deleted, then recreated.
93790.markdown: Fixes an issue that can result in namespaced custom resources being orphaned when their namespace is deleted, if the CRD defining the custom resource is removed concurrently with namespaces being deleted, then recreated. ([#93790](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/93790), [@liggitt](https://github.com/liggitt)) [SIG API Machinery and Apps]
93790.author: liggitt

94410.text:
upon successful authorization check, an impersonated user is added to the system:authenticated group.
system:anonymous when impersonated is added to the system:unauthenticated group.
94410.markdown:
Upon successful authorization check, an impersonated user is added to the system:authenticated group.
  system:anonymous when impersonated is added to the system:unauthenticated group. ([#94410](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/94410), [@tkashem](https://github.com/tkashem)) [SIG API Machinery and Testing]
94410.author: tkashem
